weatherForecast.comment: On Saturday changing weather conditions, partially cloudy partially sunny, but predominantly cloudy. Brisk southwesterly winds and strong velocity wi da in the foothills. Temperatures at noon in 2.000 m are around 1 degrees in Gurktaler Alps and and 4 degrees in Totes Gebirge.

avalancheActivity.highlights: Avalanche danger low. Persistent weak layers in shady high areas!
avalancheActivity.comment: Avalanche danger is in general low. A few danger spots exist. Medium slab avalanches can be triggered by high additional especially in entries to extremely steep shady gullies, bowls and slopes above 1.900 m. The amount of danger spots is increasing with height. Small spontaneous loose-snow  and slab avalanches are to expect on sunny slopes.

snowpackStructure.comment: Older snowdrift deposits are placed on a weak base in shady high areas. Apart that the snowcover has stabilized in most areas. On the surface a melt-hoar crust is formed. The snow base is predominantly made of faceted snow and relatively soft.

tendency.highlights: On Sunday changing weather conditions with rain- and snow showers. The avalanche danger stays low.

customData.generalHeadline: Changing weather conditions, avalanche danger low!
